Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Relates to providing notice to local elected officials for any hearing related to a water rate increase
Summary: Requires that the public service commission provide notice to local United States congressional members, state senators, state assembly members, and municipal elected officials for any hearing related to a water rate increase.
LawCode: Amd ยง89-c, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to providing notice to local elected officials for any hearing related to a water rate increase
